Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Toronto to San Diego on 7/24/1985 (Going to SD: P Dave Wehrmeister, P Jim Clancy, 1B Steve Garvey, 2B Luis Sojo. Going to TOR: P Mark Thurmond, 2B Jerry Royster, 3B German Rivera)...
Injured on 6/4/1986 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1989, off Frank Viola (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/1989, off Barry Jones (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1989, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
